name: El Septimo - Emperor Collection - King Sargon Connecticut Toro
additionalNotes: El Septimo has begun shipping The Emperor Collection, a series of 10 cigars that both pays tribute to some of history’s greatest emperors and marks the first time that the company has used a Connecticut seed wrapper on any of its cigars. The company is not disclosing specific details about the blends in the line, other than the cigar that use the Connecticut seed wrapper, while the other four cigars use a maduro wrapper of undisclosed origin.
